landing_text.header:
Hi, I`m Adrian Stan, and 
 I build things for the web.
landing_text.text: I’m a self-taught developer with almost 3 years experience of building web related projects.

aboutMe.text:
Self-taught passionate developer from Romania, currently focused on personal projects, most notable can be found below. 
 My interest in web development started back in 2019 and i've built things on the web since then. 
 At this moment i'm working at an insurance company (not related with web development)

projects.title: Movies API
projects.description:
Api for movies and series data provided by imdb, rotten tomatoes and other.
 Based on complete and daily updated database with ~ 9 million titles.
 Data is scraped from sources with a python script and stored in mongodb database. 
 
 This api is available on Rapid Api as MoviesDatabase and has around 300.000 calls every month, the average error rate below 1%, average latency 74ms. 
 
 Futures plans are to make this api an independent app not dependent on Rapid Api infrastructure.

projects.title: Movies App
projects.header: A web app for watching movies
projects.description:
This is a search & discover website for tv-shows and movie that only uses information from Movies API.
 As is a 'work in progress', future plans are to add user accounts and additional informations for movies and series.

projects.title: Xcote App
projects.header: A web app for odds and live info of sporting events
projects.description:
Compares odds for sporting events and provides live info and live odds.
 The data provided is scraped by the app backend from four of the biggest romanian sportsbooks, and it is updated every minute. 
 
Futures plans are to create user accounts to give users the posibiliy to track favorit games informations and get live notifications.

projects.title: Portofolio
projects.description: This is what are you seeing now !

projects.title: Real Time Statistics API
projects.description:
Api that provides over 300 counters of simulated real time statistics, like world population, world births, today births etc. 
 The numbers that this api provides are similar to the worldometer.com numbers.

projects.title: Xcote App Backend
projects.description:
Api and data scraper that deliver odds for sporting events, live info and live odds.
The data comes from four of the biggest romanian bookmakers, and it is updated every minute

Contact.text: I’m currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or a proposal, I’ll try my best to get back to you!
